Beerskis Seven Springs February 1995

We commonly tried to take at least one group picture just as we gathered to get on the return bus. Many of us just came from the hotel lobby bar with bloody marys, a popular pre-bus drink for this crowd! Falling asleep first was a bad move - it usually got your face decorated.

Sometimes people would start to gather in one of the rooms until the whole group piled in. When the room got too crowded, you can see where we'd spill out.
